parameters.name: Digests
parameters.description: The SHA-256 value of the image digest. Separate multiple SHA-256 values with commas (,).

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Container Registry instance in which the image repository is created. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionIds
parameters.description: The region ID of the image. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegistryTypes
parameters.description:
The type of the image repository. Separate multiple types with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **acr**
*   **harbor**
*   **quay**

parameters.name: RepoIds
parameters.description: The ID of the image repository. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RepoNames
parameters.description: The name of the image repository. Separate multiple names with commas (,).

parameters.name: RepoNamespaces
parameters.description: The namespace to which the image repository belongs. Separate multiple namespaces with commas (,).

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag that is added to the image. Separate multiple tags with commas (,).
